title: Fundamentals of Mobile-Based Crack Detection in Civil Structures

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical application design course for pre-service teachers/teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of crack detection in drone-captured video footage
